wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Bryan Hill (born 12 November 1982 in Prescot, England) is an English professional footballer who played as a defender for Rochdale in the Football League.

response: * Stephen Hill (broadcaster), American producer and host of the Hearts of Space radio program
* Stephen Hill (Australian footballer) (born 1990), Australian rules footballer
* Stephen Hill (American football) (born 1991), American football player
* Stephen Hill (academic) (born 1946), professor of management at the University of London
* Stephen Hill (entrepreneur) (born 1962), Australian skateboard and streetwear entrepreneur, producer
